name: Vendease
headline: Where restaurants in Africa buy food supplies
description:
Vendease is a marketplace that lets restaurants in Africa, order directly from farms and food manufacturers.

Now, instead of going through expensive - middlemen - vendors, or wasting productive man hours sending staff to open markets with hiked prices, restaurants can now get on our platform, click to order and get all their food supplies within 24hrs.

founders.name: Tunde Kara, Founder
founders.description:
Tunde grew up on a farm.

He has extensive experience, building brands and leveraging technology to solve problems for businesses in Africa. He has worked with and run projects for global brands present in the African market - Samsung, Coca-Cola, Google & General Electric.

His current focus: Africa's restaurants and other retailers.

Tunde leads the team at Vendease - Africa's online marketplace, connecting restaurants and other retailers, directly to supplies from farms.

founders.name: Gatumi Aliyu, Founder
founders.description: Chief Product officer Vendease (YC W21), Co Founder/Ex Chief Product Officer 54gene (YC W19)

founders.name: Oyewale Oyepeju, Founder
founders.description:
Wale grew up in the busy part of Lagos called Ikeja. 

An award-winning technology professional with 13 years of experience delivering pioneer technology projects in Sub-Saharan Africa. 
He has successfully delivered projects like MTN Nigeria Global Virtual Top-Up, Sony Who Wants To Be A Millionaire Multimedia Studio in Lekki and Facebook/Android mobile app.

Wale leads the technical team at Vendease - the Instacart for food businesses in Africa.

generated_description:
**Vendease** is revolutionizing the way restaurants in Africa procure food supplies. Founded in 2019 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W21, this innovative Lagos-based marketplace connects restaurants directly with farms and food manufacturers, cutting out overpriced middlemen and saving valuable time. Instead of relying on traditional markets, restaurant owners can simply log onto Vendease’s platform, place an order, and receive their supplies within 24 hours.

With a robust team of 250 employees, Vendease is focused on simplifying the supply chain in the food and beverage sector. They offer over 8,000 items and deliver across more than 20 states in Nigeria and Ghana, ensuring that restaurants have access to a diverse range of products at competitive prices.

Their mission is straightforward: "Where restaurants in Africa buy food supplies." This clear positioning speaks to a significant gap in the market, where the inefficiencies of traditional sourcing methods can hinder restaurant operations and profitability.

Key features of Vendease include:
- **Fast Delivery:** They promise same-day delivery, making it easier for restaurants to stay stocked without the hassle.
- **Secure Payment:** Customers can pay through various trusted payment methods, enhancing the shopping experience.
- **Customer Support:** Vendease provides 24/7 assistance, ensuring that customers have help whenever they need it.

In addition to their marketplace, Vendease also offers resources for restaurants, cafes, and hotels, helping them grow and thrive in a competitive industry. For tech-savvy restaurant owners, Vendease provides a mobile app that allows for even easier ordering and tracking.

If you're in the restaurant business in Africa, Vendease is not just a platform; it's a partner in your supply chain strategy. Check them out at [vendease.com](https://vendease.com/) for more information.
